full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

Title: EZ899-241850 – Phase 1 – Surface Treatment (km 390 – 451.4)

Reference Number: WS4480082098-Doc4480120822  
Amendment Number: 1  
Solicitation Number: WS4480082098  
Publication Date: 11 March 2024  
Tender Closing Date: 26 March 2024 (14:00)  
Amendment Date: 13 March 2024  
Expected Contract Start and End Dates: Not specified  

**Project Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for a surface treatment contract covering km 390 to 451.4 of the Alaska Highway.

**Project Scope**

The contract entails, but is not limited to, 50mm mill and inlay, sand seal, rumble strip installation, and line painting. The scope of work is between km 390 and 451 of the Alaska Highway.

**Classification**

The contract falls under the categories of:

* Highway and road construction services (UNSPSC: 72141000)
* Highway and road maintenance services (UNSPSC: 72141003)
* Highway and road resurfacing services (UNSPSC: 72141104)
* Concrete installation and repair services (UNSPSC: 72152700)
* Earthworks engineering (UNSPSC: 81101522)

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement method: Competitive – open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), NAFTA, CPTPP, CETA, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, CFTA, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contracting Entity and End User**

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

Janie Leung (SPAC/PSPC) at janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
